Package com.group12.repository

Interface ScoreRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Score,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Score,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Score,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Score>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Score,Long>
public interface ScoreRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Score,Long>
Repository interface for Score entities. Provides CRUD operations for Score entities. Also provides custom queries.

  • Method Details

    • getLeaderBoardForAll

      @Query("SELECT ku.displayName, SUM(s.totalScore) AS total FROM Score s, User ku WHERE ku.userId = s.user.userId GROUP BY ku.userId ORDER BY total DESC") List<String> getLeaderBoardForAll()
      Retrieves a leaderboard showing the sum of total scores acquired since their registration for all users. The leaderboard is sorted in descending order of total scores.
      Returns:
      A List of strings, each representing a user's display name and their summed total score.

    • getLeaderBoardForMonth

      @Query("SELECT ku.displayName, SUM(s.totalScore) AS total FROM Score s, User ku WHERE ku.userId = s.user.userId and MONTH(s.history) = ?1 GROUP BY ku.userId ORDER BY total DESC") List<String> getLeaderBoardForMonth(int month)
      Retrieves a leaderboard for the current month showing the sum of total scores for all users. The leaderboard is sorted in descending order of total scores.
      Parameters:
      month - The current month as in integer format.
      Returns:
      A List of strings, each representing a user's display name and their summed total score for the current month.

    • getLeaderBoardForWeek

      @Query("SELECT ku.displayName, SUM(s.totalScore) AS total FROM Score s, User ku WHERE ku.userId = s.user.userId and DATEDIFF(?1, s.history) < 7 GROUP BY ku.userId ORDER BY total DESC") List<String> getLeaderBoardForWeek(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Retrieves a leaderboard for the current week. The leaderboard shows the sum of total scores for all users during this period. The leaderboard is sorted in descending order of total scores of this week.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - Current dateTime in LocalDateTime format.
      Returns:
      A List of strings, each representing a user's display name and their summed total score for the current week.
